name: David Ramirez
text: See, I think about all those surrenderees here. Supposing they're for real and not press-ganged into it to make the admin look good.    There is not enough rehab capacity to help them. Withdrawal is a real thing.     Many of them will be back at it in days because they'll feel so physically miserable.    That's if they're all real of course.    Ah, here we go. Total capacity is a mere 5,000.     http://www.philstar.com/headlines/2016/07/17/1603785/doh-eyes-p1-b-budget-new-drug-rehab-centers
